summary: Request to expose the shouldContinueAsNew flag in the WorkflowInfo class for PHP SDK, allowing workflows to check if they should continue as new execution.
userImpact: Users cannot programmatically determine within a workflow whether they should continue as new, requiring workarounds or manual tracking.
resolutionDetails: The shouldContinueAsNew flag was exposed in WorkflowInfo for the PHP SDK to match functionality in other SDKs.
